summary: WrestleMania XXX was a big wrestling show by WWE in 2014. It happened in New Orleans and was the first to be shown live on the internet and TV. Hulk Hogan was the host. Daniel Bryan won the main fight, becoming the WWE World Heavyweight Champion. John Cena and Brock Lesnar also won important matches. People liked the show a lot, calling it one of the best ever. But some were upset when Brock Lesnar beat The Undertaker, ending his winning streak.
title: WrestleMania XXX
